website_summaries.verdict: A small smoker that gives food an authentic smokey flavor, plus offers the unique ability to be used in your kitchen or backyard.
pros: Can be used indoors on a stove top or outdoors on a grill, so it's extremely versatile for year-round food smoking
Has a built-in temperature gauge, just like larger models
Compact and easy to use and store
Owners rave about the tasty results it produces
cons: It's small, so it's not ideal for smoking large portions
Takes quite a bit of effort to clean

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hubby happy!
customer_reviews.text: We moved from Texas to nyc and missed our smoked meat. This has replaced and surpassed our outdoor smoker. Does not smoke much and cooks in half the time. Update: 18 months later and still going strong. Never knew I liked smoked fish!
customer_reviews.author: Toria Riccio

customer_reviews.title: Turned me into a smoking fool!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and clean. Makes you want to smoke everything.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A lil gem!
customer_reviews.text: For the days I can't go outside and use the large smoker, I stay inside and use this one. I smoked a roast which turned out tender with that smoked flavor though out.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Super easy to assemble, cook and clean. Even I don’t have a stove top vent, the kitchen did not get smoky at all. Salmon came out scrumptious. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tolga Eyidemir

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work unless you have an open flame
customer_reviews.text: I tried to put this on top of my gas grill. It took two hours to heat up that way, so I returned it. Just a word of warning: if you don' have it over an open flame it will simply take too long to cook. Otherwise, I had no issues with it, other than as others have noted it would be nice if the "food tray" had some small handles to make it easier to remove. Also, it will get charred and grease smeared right away and there's nothing you can do about it. I would just live with that, though. No big deal
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Haley

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cooking purchase ever! It did not make my condo smokey at all. Food cooked perfectly. So easy to clean. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great little indoor smoker. Light smoke taste. Meat stays moist. Fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: DGP

customer_reviews.title: Thanx
customer_reviews.text: Used both over a campfire and on the stove. Works well for my intentions.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it
customer_reviews.text: I smoked chicken wings for 3 different families and they all loved it so I had to buy one for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lil smoker
customer_reviews.text: Received my smoker and have used it often! It's perfect for winter months when you want smoked food. Will buy a couple more to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful little stove top smoker
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the wonderful aroma of the smoke but especially the exceptional taste this pot does. Recommend it completely. Hope it lasts for years. Thanks to the company that makes it. You did great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I love the smoker as this is my second one, however this one was missing the thermometer upon arrival. Hopefully someone will reach out to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Camp

customer_reviews.title: The little smoker that can!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just smoked baby back ribs with this today. This smoker is legit! Ribs tasted like they came from a high end BBQ restaurant! This is worth every penny! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer missing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product but didn’t open it for awhile. Disappointed to realize the thermometer was not included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great indoor smoker and easy clean up when drip pan is foil lined.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We smoked salmon. Turn out DELICIOUS and I don't care for salmon
customer_reviews.author: LouAnn Flaugher

customer_reviews.title: Follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Did smoked salmon the other day and it turned out great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smokin' Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavily made smoker that I'm using mainly on the side burner on my Weber genesis 330 gas grill. It'/s slightly larger than the opening of the side burner but a piece of 1/4" metal under three spots on the grate make the grate flush with the sides and a perfect solid fit. It works well and I will probably use it inside during the cold winter months. I have a wood shop and a planer and an assortment of hardwoods so I can run something through my planer and make my own fine chips. Also going to try buzzing some normal size chips in this mini food processor that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Bob P

customer_reviews.title: Smoking makes such a delicious difference...
customer_reviews.text: The easiest and most convenient way to smoke food summer/fall/winter/spring. I finish off food in an iron skillet in the oven to brown it to my liking. Be sure to get an array of different wood chips to try with different foods. Cleanup can be a little messy. Pam helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Smokin’!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this cooker is awesome. We use it in our outside kitchen. It smokes so just know that. The salmon, corn, peppers all taste so good!! Wife has taken to smoking everything lol! Restaurant quality meals a regular event now; one of our best culinary investments ever.
customer_reviews.author: Halstead Homestead

customer_reviews.title: You'd Want to Get This Smoker
customer_reviews.text: If you do not feel like standing around the grill, but desire the smoky flavor for your meats or veggies, get this smoker. This has been my best purchase this year! Easy to clean. Easy to store. I am pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Solo Dolo

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but fell flat
customer_reviews.text: A great idea. Intended to use this on the grill but sadly it appeared cheaply made. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Just wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift from my wife. I was skeptical at first, but after using it a few times I am impressed. I have used it to smoke fish, shrimp, chicken, Cornish hens and at the time of this writing I am prepping a brisket. All of the food had excellent smokiness and good flavor. While it will never replace my full size smoker, it does it's job well for smaller tasks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Garner II

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Was uncertain when I received this as a gift, but after a year of use I love it!! Quickest and best smoke salmon ever! Clean up is easy too. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nordic Ware Stovetop Kettle Smoker, One, Red
product_meta.description: Introducing 365 indoor/outdoor products designed to inspire culinary creativity indoors and out, 365 days a year. Discover the versatility in our line that brings outdoor flavors to indoor cooking, and indoor convenience to outdoor grilling. Crafted with the all- American chef in mind, 365 is the only full line of indoor/outdoor grill cookware. Infuse fragrant, flavor-enhancing smoke into meats, seafood, pizza and more. Transforms ordinary food into delicious main courses; includes high-dome cover, base pan, water pan, nonstick smoking rack, thermometer, recipe booklet and wood chips. Made in the USA with imported handles and thermometer.
feature_bullets: Smoking foods at home has never been so easy
Transforms everyday food into delicious meals
High dome cover allows for maximum capacity
Measures 6-7/8 by 13 by 13-1/2 inches. Do not cook on high heat (recommended smoking temperature is 190- 210 degrees F, adjust burner as needed)
Made in the USA with thermometer from china and handle from Taiwan

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
